Urls Documentation
===================

This part of the documentation details the URL configurations for the project.

Main URLs
---------

- Admin Interface: ``/admin/`` - Django's default admin interface.
- Home Page: ``/`` - The index view displays the home page.
- Lettings: ``/lettings/`` - Includes all letting-related URLs.
- Lettings: ``/lettings/1/`` - Includes letting details.
- Profiles: ``/profiles/`` - Includes all profile-related URLs.
- Profiles: ``/profiles/2/`` - Includes profile details.
